Content:: FC Energiya Volzhsky (Russian: ФК "Энергия Волжский") is an association football club from Volzhsky, Russia, founded in 1956. It plays in the Russian Amateur Football League. It spent several seasons in the Russian First Division in the 1990s. In the past, the team was called Torpedo Volzhsky (1976–1977 and 1980–2007) and Trud Volzhsky (1978–1979).
